note: Poverty data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices to account for inflation and differences in living costs between countries. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income (measured after taxes and benefits) or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Fertility rate vs. share living in extreme poverty
subtitle: The [total fertility rate](#dod:fertility-rate), in a given year. Extreme poverty is defined as living below the [International Poverty Line](#dod:international-poverty-line) of $3 per day.
